content.rendered:
DTC Force Case Study: Acuity Ads

From $0.54 to $14+ share price in 9 short months – is the story of Acuity Ads. We are proud to continue to customize and maintain the Salesforce system of a company that grew over 📈20x this year.

Acuity Ads peaks at over $14!

 

 

With DTC Force’s continued support and customization, Acuity Ads is now heading for the NASDAQ:
